bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Insulation Coordination--Definitions, Principles, and Rules
IEEE Standard for Insulation Coordination--Definitions, Principles, and Rules
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C62.82.1-2010 (Revision of IEEE Std 1313.1-1996)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The procedure for selection of the withstand voltages for equipment phase-to-ground and phase-to-phase insulation systems is specified. A list of standard insulation levels, based on the voltage stress to which the equipment is being exposed, is also identified. This standard applies to three-phase ac systems above 15 kV.

Revision of IEEE Std 1313.1-1996. The procedure for selection of the withstand voltages for equipment phase-to-ground and phase-to-phase insulation systems is specified. A list of standard insulation levels, based on the voltage stress to which the equipment is being exposed, is also identified. This standard applies to three-phase ac systems above 15 kV.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
